titles.title: A bill to prohibit the District of Columbia government from entering into Sister City relationships with jurisdictions located in foreign adversary countries and for other purposes.
A bill to prohibit the District of Columbia government from entering into Sister City relationships with jurisdictions located in foreign adversary countries and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
